divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my window approx 11:30pm watching some of the nearby fireworks, and I saw coming towards me over my house just over the tree tops approx. just a little smaller than a bowling ball a sphere shaped orange fireball with a white glow around it just floating thru the sky and then I saw another one about 30 seconds later seem to follow this one but then never came over the tree tops , just saw the orange glow and it must have turned and went another direction. Over the Levittown area near Pennsbury High School. My daughter told me about 2 hours previous she saw exactly the same two fireballs. Over Levittown, near Levittown Pky approx 9:00PM. No sounds, just floating like it was a fire enclosed in a white mist. Earlier around noon of July 4th, by Oxford Valley Mall and Target on Rt 1, Langhorne I saw what I first thought was an airplane but it didn't have any sound, wings or anything just a silver cigar shaped object floating very slowly in the daytime sky. I was waiting at the light and looking forward and saw it. Floating lower than where I see planes fly.
Summary: Orange fireball looking sphere just floating thru the sky.
